price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Bwira ababangikanyamana uti: “Umumalayika ajejwe urupfu ari na we abashinzwe, azobakuramwo imishaha ikiringo co kubaho kwanyu nicahera, muce mupfa, hanyuma musubizwe ku Mana yanyu Rurema Allah kugira Ibahembere ivyo mwakoze; ineza ku ciza canke inabi ku kibi”.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّىٰكُم مَّلَكُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ ٱلَّذِي وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَعُونَ

meta.transliteration: qul yatawaffākum malaku al-mawti alladhī wukkila bikum thumma ilā rabbikum tur'jaʿūna
